facultyName: School of Social and Political Science
description: Programme descriptionThis programme offers an advanced understanding of the contemporary world, developed in response to the enormous political challenges facing our changing societies.The programme draws on insights from International Relations as well as:European StudiesComparative PoliticsPolitical ScienceArea StudiesYou will explore in-depth key theories, issues and controversies, and will have the opportunity to pursue interdisciplinary studies and develop your interests in a vibrant and intellectually stimulating environment.
fees: Tuition fees vary between degree programmes. Find the specific fees for your chosen programme on our website.
